articles.title: Bandhan Bank posts 18% loan growth in FY24 - The Economic Times
articles.description: Bandhan Bank in Kolkata saw significant growth in loans and deposits by the end of the 2023-24 fiscal year, with a notable increase in CASA deposits and strong collection efficiency.
articles.content: Kolkata: Bandhan Bank on Thursday said its loans and advances have clocked Rs 1.28 lakh crore at the end of the fourth quarter of the 2023-24 fiscal, registering a 17.8 per cent growth year-on-year. … [+732 chars]

articles.title: India Plans to Control Its Entire Airspace from Nagpur, Big Move to Unify All 4 Flight Information Regions - News18
